data.title: Death and state funeral of Pierre Trudeau
data.meta_description: The death and state funeral of Pierre Trudeau took place in 2000. Pierre Trudeau was the 15th prime minister of Canada, serving from 1968 to 1984, with a brief interruption in 1979â€“1980. Trudeau died on September 28, 2000. His casket lay in state on Parliament Hill from September 30 to October 1 and the following day at Montreal City Hall. On October 3, a state funeral was held at Notre-Dame Basilica in Montreal.

2000 ceremonial funeral in Montreal, Canada / From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
